verses.roman:
hena-kāle tumi-saba kolāhala kari'
āmā iṅhā lañā āilā balātkāra kari'

synonyms: hena-kāle—at this time; tumi-saba—all of you; kolāhala kari'-making a tumultuous sound; āmā—Me; iṅhā—here; lañā āilā—brought back; balātkāra kari'-by force.
translation: "Just then, all of you made a tumultuous sound and brought Me back here by force.
